show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: repeat program
content:
On Today’s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy speaks… with Robin E.
Dodson, ScD, a research scientist with the Silent Spring Institute, who is the lead author on a new study published in a peer-reviewed scientific journal which shows that everyday consumer products – such as shampoos,  sunscreens, and laundry detergents – contain hormone disruptors and chemicals  linked to asthma that are not listed on the product labels.
